languages.text: "Я подумала ровно о том же. Но разве подобное предположение не слишком безумно даже для навигатора? Или я просто схожу с ума, подобно негодным отпрыскам моего рода?" {n}Отчаяние сквозит в словах Кассии. Заглядывая вам в глаза, она словно ждет опровержение собственных опасений.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я подумала ровно о том же. Но разве подобное предположение не слишком безумно даже для Навигатора? Или я просто схожу с ума, подобно негодным отпрыскам моего рода?" {n}Отчаяние сквозит в словах Кассии. Заглядывая вам в глаза, она словно ждет опровержение собственных опасений.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I had the same exact thoughts. But is that not a wild conjecture, even for a Navigator? Or am I simply going insane, as unworthy scions of my family have?" {n}Cassia's voice with despair. She looks you in the eye, as if expecting a refutation of her misgivings.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я подумала ровно о том же. Но разве подобное предположение не слишком безумно даже для навигатора? Или я просто схожу с ума, подобно негодным отпрыскам моего рода?" {n}Отчаяние сквозит в словах Кассии. Заглядывая вам в глаза, она словно ждет опровержение собственных опасений.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I had the same exact thoughts. But is that not a wild conjecture, even for a Navigator? Or am I simply going insane, as unworthy scions of my family have?" {n}Cassia's voice with despair. She looks you in the eye, as if expecting a refutation of her misgivings.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I had the same exact thoughts. But is that not a wild conjecture, even for a Navigator? Or am I simply going insane, as unworthy scions of my family have?" {n}Cassia's voice with despair. She looks you in the eye, as if expecting a refutation of her misgivings.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我也曾有过一模一样的想法。或许，即便是对导航者而言，这样的猜想也并非无稽之谈？还是说，我只是发了疯，和我的家族那些毫无价值的子嗣一样，沦为了疯子？”{n}卡西娅的声音中带着绝望。她看着你的眼睛，似乎在期待你反驳她的疑虑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I had the same exact thoughts. But is that not a wild conjecture, even for a Navigator? Or am I simply going insane, as unworthy scions of my family have?" {n}Cassia's voice with despair. She looks you in the eye, as if expecting a refutation of her misgivings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我也曾有过一模一样的想法。或许，即便是对导航者而言，这样的猜想也并非无稽之谈？还是说，我只是发了疯，和我的家族那些毫无价值的子嗣一样，沦为了疯子？”{n}卡西娅的声音中带着绝望。她看着你的眼睛，似乎在期待你反驳她的疑虑。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I had the same exact thoughts. But is that not a wild conjecture, even for a Navigator? Or am I simply going insane, as unworthy scions of my family have?" {n}Cassia's voice with despair. She looks you in the eye, as if expecting a refutation of her misgivings.{/n}

languages.text: «Eso mismo pensaba yo. Pero ¿no es una conjetura descabellada incluso para una Navegante? ¿Estaré perdiendo la cabeza como los vástagos indignos de mi familia?». {n}La voz de Cassia está llena de desesperación. Te mira a los ojos, como si esperara que disipes sus dudas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I had the same exact thoughts. But is that not a wild conjecture, even for a Navigator? Or am I simply going insane, as unworthy scions of my family have?" {n}Cassia's voice with despair. She looks you in the eye, as if expecting a refutation of her misgivings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Eso mismo pensaba yo. Pero ¿no es una conjetura descabellada incluso para una Navegante? Estaré perdiendo la cabeza como los vástagos indignos de mi familia?». {n}La voz de Cassia está llena de desesperación. Te mira a los ojos, como si esperara que disipes sus dudas.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「私もまったく同じことを考えていました。ですが、航宙士といえども、それは乱暴な憶測ではないでしょうか？それとも、私の一族にふさわしくない子孫たちがそうであるように、私はただ正気を失っているのでしょうか？」{n} カシアの声には絶望が込められていた。まるで反論を期待しているかのように、彼女はあなたの目を見た。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I had the same exact thoughts. But is that not a wild conjecture, even for a Navigator? Or am I simply going insane, as unworthy scions of my family have?" {n}Cassia's voice with despair. She looks you in the eye, as if expecting a refutation of her misgivings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私もまったく同じことを考えていました。ですが、航宙士といえども、それは乱暴な憶測ではないでしょうか？それとも、私の一族にふさわしくない子孫たちがそうであるように、私はただ正気を失っているのでしょうか？」{n} カシアの声には絶望が込められていた。まるで反論を期待しているかのように、彼女はあなたの目を見た。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich hatte exakt die gleichen Gedanken. Aber ist das nicht eine etwas wilde Hypothese, selbst für eine Navigatorin? Oder werde ich einfach wahnsinnig, wie unwürdige Sprösslinge meiner Familie es oft tun?" {n}Verzweiflung liegt in Cassias Stimme. Sie blickt dir in die Augen, als würde sie eine Anfechtung Ihrer Bedenken erwarten.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I had the same exact thoughts. But is that not a wild conjecture, even for a Navigator? Or am I simply going insane, as unworthy scions of my family have?" {n}Cassia's voice with despair. She looks you in the eye, as if expecting a refutation of her misgivings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich hatte exakt die gleichen Gedanken. Aber ist das nicht eine etwas wilde Hypothese, selbst für eine Navigatorin? Oder werde ich einfach wahnsinnig, wie unwürdige Sprösslinge meiner Familie es oft tun?" {n}Verzweiflung liegt in Cassias Stimme. Sie blickt dir in die Augen, als würde sie eine Anfechtung Ihrer Bedenken erwarten.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « C'est ce que je pense également, mais n'est-ce pas une théorie complètement insensée, même pour une navigatrice ? Ou peut-être suis-je en train de perdre l'esprit, comme les autres héritiers indignes de ma famille ? » {n}Vous décelez une pointe de désespoir dans la voix tremblante de Cassia. Elle plante son regard dans le vôtre, comme si elle espérait que vous réfutiez son hypothèse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I had the same exact thoughts. But is that not a wild conjecture, even for a Navigator? Or am I simply going insane, as unworthy scions of my family have?" {n}Cassia's voice with despair. She looks you in the eye, as if expecting a refutation of her misgivings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est ce que je pense également, mais n'est-ce pas une théorie complètement insensée, même pour une navigatrice ? Ou peut-être suis-je en train de perdre l'esprit, comme les autres héritiers indignes de ma famille ? » {n}Vous décelez une pointe de désespoir dans la voix tremblante de Cassia. Elle plante son regard dans le vôtre, comme si elle espérait que vous réfutiez son hypothèse.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ben de aynısını düşündüm. Yine de bu, bir Rotacı için bile fazla çılgınca bir tahmin değil midir? Yoksa ailemin değersiz evlatları gibi ben de mi deliriyorum?" {n}Cassia'nın sesine ümitsizlik hâkim oluyor. Kuruntularının aksini kanıtlamanı bekliyormuşçasına gözünün içine bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I had the same exact thoughts. But is that not a wild conjecture, even for a Navigator? Or am I simply going insane, as unworthy scions of my family have?" {n}Cassia's voice with despair. She looks you in the eye, as if expecting a refutation of her misgivings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ben de aynısını düşündüm. Yine de bu, bir Rotacı için bile fazla çılgınca bir tahmin değil mi? Yoksa ailemin değersiz evlatları gibi ben de mi deliriyorum aslında?" {n}Cassia'nın sesine ümitsizlik hâkim. Kuruntularının aksini kanıtlamanı bekliyormuşçasına gözünün içine bakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
